name: Judgement
description: The end is near. The Blackfin Divisions plans for the complete and utter destruction is on the horison. If nothing is done, then everyone will die.

name: Weapons Manufacturing
description: The blackfin division's weapons manufacturing facility is running at 100% efficiency, and will soon produce weapons to suppress any opposition.

name: Blackfin Division
description: Previously a branch of Harrison Armory's military units. Now a renegade group which has taken forceful control of Doppler-14 after inciting a war between the local people of the planet and the union.

name: Badgers
description: A resistance group which formed during the bombing of Malran by the Blackfin divison.  They have been engaging in gurilla tactics agains the remaining union auxilaries and the  blackfin division.

name: Cecropia Group
description: A gang of pirates and haulers that have their origin within the SSC (Smith-Shimando Corpro). Becoming profiteers after the war began, they control one of the few remaining large scale printers left on the planet.

name: Harrison Loyalists
description: After the 30 years of war on Doppler-14 people loyal to Harrison armory have started to work against the Blackfin divison. Lead by Isma Racksand, they seek to return home to their home world Ras Shamra.

name: Munnin's Jailers
description: Appearing after the excavation of the drop point by the Blackfin division. This highly dangerous group of Horus operatives have brought mass destruction to the world.

name: United Doppler
description: The remaining auxiliary forces of the Union that remained on Doppler-14 after all communications with the outside world was cut off. Led by Retvil Kas they have attempted to reestablish relations with the locals, provide humanitarian aid, and maintain peace.
